title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8450.4 - Records available for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8450.4 - Records available for public inspection

State Regulations
(a) War bonus payment records (except
individual bonus applications). (b) Research, publicity and statistical reports prepared by division
staff. (c) Final opinions made in
the adjudication of blind annuity applications made for a World War II
bonus. (d) Statements of policy and
interpretation adopted by the division, including any documents, memoranda, data or other material constituting statistical or factual tabulations which
led to the formulation thereof. (e) Minutes of meetings. (f) Internal
or external audits and statistical or factual tabulations. (g) Administrative staff manuals and
instructions to staff that affect members of the public. (h) Any other files, records, papers or
documents required by any other provision of law to be made available for
public inspection and copying. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8450.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
